mapper.select: select id, group_id as groupId, artifact_id as artifactId, version as version, `type`, license, url from deploy_package where group_id = #{groupId} and artifact_id = #{artifactId} and version = #{version}
mapper.insert: insert into deploy_package( id, group_id, artifact_id, version, `type`, license, url ) values( #{id}, #{groupId}, #{artifactId}, #{version}, #{type}, #{license}, #{url} )
